instructions_step1.message: Enable No Reel For Instagram in Safari: on Mac, open Safari ▸ Settings ▸ Extensions; on iPhone/iPad, go to Settings ▸ Safari ▸ Extensions.

instructions_step2.message: Open instagram.com and sign in. Reload any tabs you already have open.

instructions_step3.message: Use this popup to turn features on or off whenever you need a calmer feed.

instructions_note.message: Tip: allow Safari to run the extension in Private Browsing if you use it there.
